subject: Rajasthan Culture
topic: Rajasthani Sahitya: Prachin, Madhyakalin aur Aadhunik Sahityakar
question_en: Who is the famous Rajasthani poet known for his work 'Chopai Balwant'?
question_hi: चोपाई बलवंत के लिए जाने जाने वाले प्रसिद्ध राजस्थानी कवि कौन हैं?
explanation_en: Kanhaiyalal Sethia is known for his work 'Chopai Balwant'.
explanation_hi: कन्हैयालाल सेठिया 'चोपाई बलवंत' के लिए जाने जाते हैं।

subject: Rajasthan Culture
topic: Rajasthani Sahitya: Prachin, Madhyakalin aur Aadhunik Sahityakar
question_en: Which famous Rajasthani poet wrote 'Prithviraj Raso'?
question_hi: किस प्रसिद्ध राजस्थानी कवि ने 'पृथ्वीराज रासो' लिखा?

subject: Rajasthan Culture
topic: Rajasthani Sahitya: Prachin, Madhyakalin aur Aadhunik Sahityakar
question_en: Who is known as the 'Father of Rajasthani Literature'?
question_hi: राजस्थानी साहित्य के 'पिता' के रूप में किसे जाना जाता है?
explanation_en: Chand Bardai is known as the 'Father of Rajasthani Literature'.
explanation_hi: चंद बर्दाई को 'राजस्थानी साहित्य के पिता' के रूप में जाना जाता है।

subject: Rajasthan Culture
topic: Rajasthani Sahitya: Prachin, Madhyakalin aur Aadhunik Sahityakar
question_hi: किस राजस्थानी कवि ने 'भूल भुलैया' लिखा?

subject: Rajasthan Culture
topic: Rajasthani Sahitya: Prachin, Madhyakalin aur Aadhunik Sahityakar
question_en: Who wrote the famous Rajasthani novel 'Umrao Singh Ji Ka Aashram'?
question_hi: प्रसिद्ध राजस्थानी उपन्यास 'उमराव सिंह जी का आश्रम' किसने लिखा?
explanation_en: Bhikhanlal Rathi wrote 'Umrao Singh Ji Ka Aashram'.
explanation_hi: भीखनलाल राठी ने 'उमराव सिंह जी का आश्रम' लिखा।

subject: Rajasthan Culture
topic: Rajasthani Sahitya: Prachin, Madhyakalin aur Aadhunik Sahityakar
question_en: Which famous Rajasthani writer wrote 'Rajasthani Lok Kathayein'?
question_hi: किस प्रसिद्ध राजस्थानी लेखक ने 'राजस्थानी लोक कथाएं' लिखा?
explanation_hi: श्यामलदास चौधरी ने 'राजस्थानी लोक कथाएं' लिखा।

subject: Rajasthan Culture
topic: Rajasthani Sahitya: Prachin, Madhyakalin aur Aadhunik Sahityakar
question_en: Who is the author of 'Mewar Ka Itihas'?
question_hi: 'मेवाड़ का इतिहास' के लेखक कौन हैं?
explanation_en: Mohammad Salim is the author of 'Mewar Ka Itihas'.
explanation_hi: मोहम्मद सलीम 'मेवाड़ का इतिहास' के लेखक हैं।

subject: Rajasthan Culture
topic: Rajasthani Sahitya: Prachin, Madhyakalin aur Aadhunik Sahityakar
question_en: Which poet is known for writing in Rajasthani dialect 'Chaboli'?
question_hi: कौन सा कवि राजस्थानी बोली 'चबोली' में लिखने के लिए जाना जाता है?
explanation_en: Narayana Bhatt is known for writing in Rajasthani dialect 'Chaboli'.
explanation_hi: नारायण भट्ट राजस्थानी बोली 'चबोली' में लिखने के लिए जाने जाते हैं।

subject: Rajasthan Culture
topic: Rajasthani Sahitya: Prachin, Madhyakalin aur Aadhunik Sahityakar

subject: Rajasthan Culture
topic: Rajasthani Sahitya: Prachin, Madhyakalin aur Aadhunik Sahityakar
question_en: Which Rajasthani poet is known for his work 'Sultana Ki Sringar'?
question_hi: कौन सा राजस्थानी कवि अपने काम 'सुल्ताना की सिंगार' के लिए जाना जाता है?
explanation_en: Narayana Bhatt is known for his work 'Sultana Ki Sringar'.
explanation_hi: नारायण भट्ट 'सुल्ताना की सिंगार' के लिए जाने जाते हैं।
